label: Description
value: Rectangular piece made up of central section with border sewn on either side. Fringe on three sides. In the borders, warps form stripes in one part and bird designs in another. In the central section, warps form stripes in one part and design of interlocking birds' heads in another. Colors are brown, tan, and shades of red and yellow.

label: Provenance

label: Description
value: Rectangular linen coverlet embroidered in yellowish silk on an off-white ground. Eight cartouches showing a mixture of European and Indian figures of hunters on horseback and on foot, with exotic animals and vegetation. Devil-like figures with horns appear throughout. The bottom vignettes contain scenes from the biblical story in which Judith severs Holoferne's head to save her people. Figures fill all of the space inside and outside the scrolling framework of the cartouches.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: tussah silk embroidery on cotton foundation Technique: embroidered in chain stitches on plain weave foundation Label: cotton embroidered in tussah silk

label: Description
value: A long, rectangular scarf in sheer piña and silk cloth with cotton embroidery in a design depicting a flowering tree in a bowl at each end, surrounded by a deep floral border on four sides. Edges are scalloped.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, silk, cotton Technique: embroidered in satin stitch and drawn work on plain weave
Design for a Pottery Tile Stove

label: Description
value: Design for a stove made of tiles with painted transfer designs on them—three rows in both top and bottom section of two tiles each—romantic scenes with castles, etc., borders of geometric designs and above two large bunches of fruit.

Page of a sketchbook; Chariot and three horses

label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle. A chariot drawn by three horses. In the chariot, a female figure holding an open book; a dove surrounded by rays sits on her shoulder. Preceding or leading the horses are two women and a bishop in his robes. Above: "Terzo."

label: Physical description
value: Brown ink and wash on cream paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of the Advisory Council
View of an English Palladian country house in a park

label: Description
value: View of the façade of a house in the Palladian classic style with pilasters; a man and two ladies at the front of the steps. A rustic bridge over a stream on the left. A summer house on the right.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and ink with watercolors on paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of the Advisory Council

label: Description

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and wash on cream laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of the Advisory Council

label: Description
value: Design for a Christmas creche.  A courtyard with a building and a tree on the left and a building with a thatched roof on right.  In the center the Virgin and Child.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink on cream paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of the Advisory Council

label: Description

value: Pen and black ink, brush and wash on vellum

Page of a sketchbook; Chariot and three horses

label: Description
value: Chariot drawn by three horses. Four women seated in it. One on sort of a throne. Written above her, "Grese." Four flying angels precede it, also an abbott and cardinal. Above: "Quattro."

label: Physical description
value: Brown ink and wash on cream paper
Preliminary study for the Triumph of the Holy Scripture

label: Description
value: A chariot drawn by a bullock and a goat. Two female figures seated in the chariot. One has a halo. The reins are held in the beak of a large bird flying ahead of the goat and bullock. Verso: inscription.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and brown ink and wash on laid paper
Page of a sketchbook; Mary holding body of Christ at foot of Cross

label: Description
value: Mary holding the dead body of Christ which has just been taken down from the Cross. Several other women with her. Recto: dish closet.

label: Physical description
value: Brown ink and wash on paper
Page of a sketchbook; Flight into Egypt; Crucifixion

label: Description
value: Recto: The Virgin riding on a donkey and another donkey beside her. A large head of Joseph in front of the donkeys, suggesting that he is leading them on foot. Verso: Crucifixion

label: Physical description
value: Brown ink and wash on paper
Half Page of a sketchbook; Virgin and Child with Joseph

label: Description
value: Virgin and Child seated against a wall. Joseph standing up beside them. Recto: left half of a scene, perhaps Salome with head of John the Baptist.

label: Physical description
value: Brown ink and wash on paper
Half Page of a sketchbook; Virgin and Child and a third figure

label: Description
value: Virgin seated under a tree holding the Infant Jesus on her lap. Behind her another figure, maybe Joseph. Recto: the other half of the banquet scene on reverse of 1947-58-5.

label: Physical description
value: Brown ink and wash on paper
